input_email_body:
Subject: 

I am contacting you to report a failure in the integration between Monday.com and SAP ERP. The problem might be due to incompatible API versions. I have tried to fix it by restarting the systems, reviewing the logs, and confirming the credentials, but the issue still occurs You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. I would appreciate your help in addressing this issue promptly. My name is Maria Gonzalez.
